name: Baldi's basics full remastered
description:
Baldi's basics full remastered is a very big decompile based on Baldi Open Modding Tool!

Hide And Seek you need to collect all the notebooks and pass through 3 different floors.

In Camping you need to help baldi "keep the fire going" and collect as many points as you can.

There are many more modes that you should play!

Controls:

WASD - Move.

Mouse - Turn Around.

Mouse Wheel/1/2/3/4/5 - Change item selection.

Left Click - Open doors, pick up items and other interactions.

Right Click - Use selected Item.

Shift - Run (You better watch your stamina!).

Space - Look Behind You.

R - Drink

X - Drop your item.

GameJolt page: https://gamejolt.com/games/remastered-baldi-full/449382

GameBanana page:https://gamebanana.com/mods/329152
